name: Wemoji - WhatsApp Sticker Maker
description: Best FREE editor WAStickerApps to make your own sticker for WhatsApp with feature to Free Hand Crop photos, Add multiples photos, Add text, emoji, sticker and more!  You can make you own custom sticker in just a few easy steps 1. Open Sticker Editor 2. Add photos with free hand crop feature 3. Add Text and Sticker 4. Save to your own sticker packs 5. Publish and Enjoy !  Features   Free hand crop photos You can crop face and any object in a photo using free hand mode with magnifying glass support  Reuseable cropped photos You can reuse all the cropped photo to create another sticker  Text and Sticker 1. Add text for your stickers, with many free fonts and free stickers choices for the text editing. 2. Add stylish stickers and emojis for your sticker 3. You can add those text, emoji, and sticker then combine it into 1 funny WhatsApp stickers  Note : Please make sure you already using the latest WhatsApp that support stickers.
